text: Oatmeal is a meal, usually porridge, made of oats. It is normally made for breakfast. Oatmeal can also be steel-cut oats, crushed oats, or rolled oats. Occasionally, brown sugar, honey, jelly, or other items are added to oatmeal. It makes a tasty treat for all to enjoy. It is looked forward to as a light meal. ==References== Category:Oats Category:Breakfast foods
title: Oatmeal
